page.title: 05DUNDEE - ARMED FORCES
page.content: The 23rd {SPECIAL AIR SERVICE} (volunteers) has a squadron based in the {TERRITORIAL ARMY HALL,INVERGOWRIE The S.A.S.,founded by Colonel David Stirling in 1941,carries out raids on targets far behind enemy lines.The aim is to provide a highly trained and efficient reserve.The members ( males aged 18-32 ) must: {1..attend a 15 day annual camp. { 2..attend 12 days out-of-camp { training at weekends. } {3..fire an annual personal weapon { test. Training sessions are held on one evening weekly.No special qualifications are needed but you must not have a police record.There is a 3-4 month pre-selection course held at week-ends.Map and compass skills are developed.
